Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.ActionsProvider
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Match
  • public class Match
extends ActionsProvider
    This class represent he entire Match, it contains all the references to the Players, the GameBoard, the current Turn and the possible Actions. It directly communicate with the Controller for the Action that can be done by the currently playing Player and it updates the whole game state when necessary. It also notify the Controller when the Match is over

    • Constructor Detail

      • Match

        public Match​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersName,
             java.util.List<PlayerColor> playerColors,
             int gameLength,
             int mapType)
        Given the names and the colors of the Players, chosen through the Client, it creates the GameBoard and all Players
        Parameters:
        playersName - The list of the name the Players chose
        playerColors - The list of the colors the Players chose
        gameLength - The number of skulls, from 5 to 8
        mapType - The map type, from 0 to 3

    • Method Detail

      • createPlayers

        private void createPlayers​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playersName,
                           java.util.List<PlayerColor> playerColors)
        This method creates all the Players that are playing this Match
        Parameters:
        playersName - The Players names
        playerColors - The Players colors

      • spawn

        private void spawn​(boolean respawn)
        This method spawn the Players during the first round of the game and respawn them at the end of the turn in which they died
        Parameters:
        respawn - Is false if the player need to spawn for the first time, true otherwise

      • onTurnCompleted

        private void onTurnCompleted()
        This method is called when a Turn is over, it spawns all the dead Players and starts the next Turn

      • newTurn

        private void newTurn()
        This method initializes and starts a new Turn

      • setNewActions

        private void setNewActions​(java.util.List<Action> actions)
        This method set on the curAction parameter the Actions that can be done by the current playing Player and invoke the event which notify the current Player about the action that can be done
        Parameters:
        actions - The action that can be done by the current playing Player

      • onPlayerDamaged

        private void onPlayerDamaged​(Player damaged,
                             Player shooter)
        This method is called through an event when a Player is damaged, it creates a new BranchMap that makes the damaged player choose if it wants to activate a CounterAttackPowerUpCard
        Parameters:
        damaged - The damaged Player
        shooter - Current turn's player. Player who is using the shooting effect

      • assignPoints

        public void assignPoints​(Player deadPlayer)
        This method assign the points to Players whenever a Player is killed, before it respawn
        Parameters:
        deadPlayer - Player from whom is taken the information about the amount of points that need to be assigned to the other players.

      • updateKillShotTrack

        private void updateKillShotTrack​(java.util.List<PlayerColor> damage,
                                 Player deadPlayer)
        This method updates the kill shot track whenever a player is killed and its points are assigned, it also updates finalFrenzy and the frenzyStarter when needed
        Parameters:
        damage - The new kill shot track to addTarget
        deadPlayer - The dead player that is being evaluated

      • createSnapshot

        public MatchSnapshot createSnapshot​(int numPlayer)
        This method creates a MatchSnapshot of the current game state
        Parameters:
        numPlayer - The index of the Player the MatchSnapShot will be sent to
        Returns:
        The MatchSnapshot of the current game state
